anecdotes: Naral once single-handedly defeated a group of bandits who were attacking the enclave's food stores.
Whenever Naral tells stories to the children of the enclave, they are always captivated by his tales of adventure and heroism.
Naral Koeheruil.clothes: long woolen tunic, pants, and leather boots with a thick woolen cape
Naral Koeheruil.description: Naral Koeheruil is the beloved leader and skilled warrior of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He has been in this position for many years and has worked tirelessly to ensure the survival of his community. Naral is highly respected within the community, as he shoulders a great deal of responsibility and has demonstrated time and again that he cares deeply for the people under his protection. Despite his many responsibilities, Naral is still a skilled warrior and is always willing to defend his community from any threats. He has a close relationship with Barl, whom he trusts implicitly and often seeks his advice.

family.relationship: Highly respected within the community

Naral Koeheruil.habits: Naral is a strong and disciplined leader who leads by example. He is always the first one up in the morning and the last to go to bed at night. He has a strict but fair routine that he follows every day and expects the same from those around him. Naral is very organized and always keeps a detailed record of everything that happens within the enclave. He is also an avid reader and spends much of his free time studying the books he has acquired from the lost civilization.
Naral Koeheruil.hair: gray and tied into a ponytail
Naral Koeheruil.history: Naral was born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He is a half-elf and has always been valued for his physical prowess and intelligence. When he was still a young man, he began to take on more responsibility within the enclave and quickly became recognized as a natural leader. When the previous leader passed away, Naral was selected as his successor. Since then, he has worked tirelessly to ensure the survival of his community, despite the precarious existence they lead. As the leader of the enclave, Naral has faced many challenges, but he has always managed to find a way to overcome them. He has a secret stash of books from the lost civilization, which he is using to uncover more about their lost history and improve the lives of those under his protection.

job.description: Beloved leader and skilled warrior
job.quote: With great power comes great...
job.relations: As the leader of the enclave, Naral shoulders a great deal of responsibility. He is a skilled warrior and a wise counselor, and is loved by his people for his strength and compassion. He has a close relationship with Barl, whom he trusts implicitly, and often seeks his advice.

Naral Koeheruil.name: Naral
plot: A group of scavengers has recently been spotted near the enclave. Naral suspects that they may be planning an attack and has tasked his warriors with preparing for the worst.

Naral has been spending more and more time studying the lost civilization's books in his secret stash. Some of the other members of the enclave are becoming concerned that he may be neglecting his responsibilities as leader.
A newcomer has arrived in the enclave and is causing trouble. Naral must decide how to deal with this person without disrupting the communal bonds that hold his community together.
Naral Koeheruil.relations: As the leader of the enclave, Naral shoulders a great deal of responsibility. He is a skilled warrior and a wise counselor, and is loved by his people for his strength and compassion. He has a close relationship with Barl, whom he trusts implicitly, and often seeks his advice.

relationship.Azaselin Koeheruil: Although Azaselin can sometimes be difficult to deal with, Naral cares deeply for his youngest son and hopes to help him find his place within the enclave.
relationship.Barl Wroughthammer: Naral has a close relationship with Barl, whom he trusts implicitly and often seeks his advice.
relationship.Evreth Koeheruil: Naral is disappointed in Evreth's behavior and wishes that his cousin would take on more responsibility within the enclave.
relationship.Latenspar Koeheruil: Naral loves his young son Latenspar and enjoys spending time playing with him when he is able to.
relationship.Lyudrim Koeheruil: Lyudrim is Naral's mother and a respected elder within the enclave. Naral values her wisdom and often seeks out her advice on important matters.
relationship.Ryaeletha Koeheruil: Naral loves his granddaughter Ryaeletha and is always impressed by her curiosity and sense of adventure.
relationship.Saeryl Koeheruil: Naral respects his grandfather Saeryl and often seeks out his advice on important matters.
relationship.Yaraeeae Koeheruil: Naral is proud of his eldest son Yaraeeae and believes that he has the potential to one day take over as leader of the enclave.

Naral Koeheruil.secret: Naral has a secret stash of books from the lost civilization

anecdotes: Quinn once traded rare herbs and potions with a hermit living deep within the haunted forest of the enclave. The transaction was tricky, as the hermit refused to speak to Quinn directly, instead communicating through a series of notes.

When Quinn was a teenager, he and his friends stumbled upon an abandoned tower in the center of the enclave. After scaling its walls to the top, they discovered a hidden room containing maps and scrolls detailing a lost civilization that predates their own.

Once, during a heavy storm, Quinn offered shelter to a group of travelers who were stranded in the enclave. He spent the next several days regaling them with stories of the enclave's lost history, while they shared tales of their own adventures.

Quinn has a habit of collecting unique and valuable trinkets during his travels. He keeps them in a small box tucked away in his home, and he enjoys showing them off to visitors. One particular trinket, a golden compass, is said to point towards an unknown destination somewhere within the enclave's borders.
Quinn Vain.description: Quinn Vain, also known as The Halfling Elder, is a wise and respected member of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He is a skilled trader working at The Hopefuls' Alliance, leading the co-op alongside Geduve Steadfast. Quinn is an expert in his field, and he believes that the key to trading lies in listening more than speaking. Despite his age, he remains very pretty, with bright and kind grey eyes and long silvery hair. He usually dresses in a dignified robe with green accents and carries a staff. Quinn has a fatherly relationship with all members of the community, and he is respected by everyone in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones.

family.relationship: respected by everyone in the enclave, fatherly towards all members

Quinn Vain.habits: Quinn Vain is a patient and wise halfling who spends most of his time trading goods at The Hopefuls' Alliance. He is a great listener and enjoys hearing stories from people. When he's not working, Quinn likes to spend his spare time reading books, including a rare book of magic spells that he has been hiding for years.
Quinn Vain.history: Born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, Quinn is a native halfling who has lived there his entire life. He's seen it all, from the precarious existence of the community's early days to its current status as a resilient and resourceful group with communal bonds. Quinn's fatherly nature has made him a respected figure among both young and old members of the enclave. He is an integral part of a single trading alliance at The Hopefuls' Alliance, where he has worked with Geduve Steadfast to lead the co-op to prosperity. Quinn has been married to Niall for over 30 years, and they have four children: Mara, Durgan, Ryleigh, and himself.

job.description: wise and respected
job.quote: "The key to trading is in listening more than speaking"
job.relations: leading the co-op

Quinn Vain.name: Quinn
plot: Quinn's rare book of magic spells is coveted by a rival trading alliance in the enclave, who will stop at nothing to acquire it.
An ancient artifact is discovered within the enclave, and Quinn is convinced that it holds the key to uncovering the community's lost history.
Quinn discovers a dark secret about The Hopefuls' Alliance, and he must decide whether to reveal it and risk the loss of his position as the co-op's leader.

As a respected member of the community, Quinn is called upon to mediate a dispute between two feuding families in the enclave, but he soon realizes that there is more to the conflict than meets the eye.
Quinn Vain.quote: "The key to trading is in listening more than speaking"

relationship.Darlave Softshadow: Darlave is Quinn's apprentice at The Hopefuls' Alliance, and Quinn appreciates her inquisitive nature and intelligence. He enjoys teaching her about the intricacies of trading.
relationship.Durgan Vain: Durgan is Quinn's youngest son. He is energetic and curious, and he often accompanies his father on trading expeditions. Quinn is proud of his son's adventurous spirit, but he worries about his tendency towards clumsiness.
relationship.Geduve Steadfast: Geduve is Quinn's colleague at The Hopefuls' Alliance, and they work closely together to lead the co-op. They share a deep respect for each other's skills, and they often confide in one another.
relationship.Jordan Hurst: Jordan is a kind and wise member of the community who has earned Quinn's respect over the years. They share a mutual admiration for each other's wisdom and compassion.
relationship.Juliana Fullet: Juliana is a wise and loving matriarch who is respected by everyone in the enclave, including Quinn. He often seeks her guidance when dealing with personal or community matters.
relationship.Mara Vain: Mara is Quinn's eldest daughter. She is skilled and independent, and she often works with her father at The Hopefuls' Alliance. They share a deep respect for one another.
relationship.Niall Vain: Quinn is married to Niall, and they have a close and nurturing relationship. They have been together for over 30 years, and they have raised four children together.
relationship.Ryleigh Vain: Ryleigh is Quinn's youngest child, and he is introverted and sensitive. Although they do not share many interests, Quinn loves his son deeply and respects his studious nature.
relationship.Una Bradner: Una is Quinn's senior colleague at The Hopefuls' Alliance, and he admires her toughness and resourcefulness. He often seeks her advice when making difficult business decisions.

Quinn Vain.secret: he has been hiding a rare book of magic spells for years

anecdotes: Trynyn once saved his cousin, Theradarsha Tyaruil, from a treacherous booby trap in the ruins. From that day on, the two became even closer.

During a scavenging mission with members of The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity, Trynyn encountered a strange and otherworldly creature. His quick thinking and bravery saved his team from certain doom.
Trynyn is known for his love of stories, often retelling tales from the lost civilization to his family and friends.
When one of his daughters, Relyth Tyaruil, expressed an interest in painting, Trynyn encouraged her and even helped her build a small art studio.
Trynyn Tyaruil.clothes: leather armor and simple tunics in earth tones
Trynyn Tyaruil.description: Trynyn Tyaruil is a 40-year-old half-elf who serves as the leader of his family. He is known for his protective and respected nature, always placing the safety of his loved ones first. Trynyn is a tall man with fair skin, short straight black hair, and brown eyes. He wears leather armor and simple tunics in earth tones. Trynyn's role in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones is crucial for the community's survival. He ensures that the community stays together and maintains communal bonds. He also leads various exploration missions in the surrounding area to find resources and any artifacts from the lost civilization. Despite the precarious existence of the community, Trynyn remains resourceful and resilient. His determination has inspired many in the community and earned him the nickname 'The Protector.'

family.relationship: respected and admired by his family members, tries to keep them safe

Trynyn Tyaruil.habits: Trynyn has a habit of waking up early and starting the day with a prayer to his non-gendered deity. He then spends time training for combat or exploring the ruins nearby, always accompanied by members of his family or colleagues from The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity. Trynyn is also known for his fairness and responsibility, always striving to lead by example.
Trynyn Tyaruil.history: Trynyn was born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He comes from a family of natives and has lived his entire life in this forgotten realm. Trynyn learned about the single god worshipped in the community and its unique local beliefs from an early age. His family has always been close-knit, instilling in him a strong sense of family-first values. As he grew older and took on more responsibilities, Trynyn became determined to preserve his lost civilization's history and culture. He also became passionate about finding artifacts from this forgotten realm and exploring the ruins nearby. Trynyn's family and colleagues from The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity respect him for his dedication and unwavering determination.

job.description: Protective and respected family leader
job.quote: "Our unity will always keep us strong."
job.relations: Has a close relationship with Nimimilavain Tyaruil, is protective of Mahs'Besalasel during exploration missions.
job.workplace: The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity

Trynyn Tyaruil.name: Trynyn
plot: Trynyn may face challenges from rival scavenger groups who want to exploit The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones' resources. This could lead to dangerous territory disputes and conflicts.
As a leader, Trynyn may be faced with difficult decisions, such as whether to allow new members to join the community or how to allocate resources fairly.
The discovery of a valuable artifact could put The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones in danger, attracting the attention of powerful and unsavory characters.
Trynyn's past may come back to haunt him if he encounters someone from his hometown, who he believed died many years ago.
Trynyn Tyaruil.quote: "Our unity will always keep us strong."
Trynyn Tyaruil.relations: Has a close relationship with Nimimilavain Tyaruil, is protective of Mahs'Besalasel during exploration missions.

relationship.Feraro Tyaruil: Trynyn's mother, Feraro Tyaruil, is a strong-willed and protective presence in his life. While he doesn't always agree with her decisions, he deeply loves and respects her.
relationship.Gilihalki Tyaruil: Trynyn's eldest son, Gilihalki Tyaruil, is a skilled warrior admired by many in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. Trynyn is proud of his son's bravery and loyalty.
relationship.Mahs'Besalasel: Trynyn is protective of Mahs'Besalasel, an explorer and apprentice in The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity. He sees potential in her and has made it his mission to ensure she stays safe and learns from her experiences.
relationship.Nimimilavain Tyaruil: Trynyn has a very close relationship with his grandmother, Nimimilavain Tyaruil. He greatly respects her wisdom and often seeks her counsel when making important decisions.
relationship.Nuiss Tyaruil: Trynyn's eldest daughter, Nuiss Tyaruil, is responsible and hardworking, constantly looking out for others. Trynyn is proud of her and hopes to pass on his leadership skills to her one day.
relationship.Theradarsha Tyaruil: Trynyn's cousin, Theradarsha Tyaruil, is curious and carefree, often joining him on exploration missions. The two share a close bond and look out for each other in dangerous situations.

anecdotes: Una once outwitted a group of scavengers who were trying to steal goods from The Hopefuls' Alliance. She managed to get them to leave without any violence while keeping the supplies safe.
Una is known for her motherly relationship towards Dunla Ironside, who looks up to her as a mentor and role model.
Una secretly loves one of the inhabitants in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, but has not revealed the identity of the person to anyone.
Una Bradner.description: Una Bradner, also known as The Resourceful One, is a tough, intelligent and resourceful woman. She wears a leather armor and fur mantle with boots. Her brown eyes and long brown hair complement her fair skin. Una is 37 years old, but looks young for her age. She lives in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, a small community with communal bonds and a precarious existence. Una is the chief of the hierarchy group composed of herself and an apprentice named Dunla Ironside. Una is an outsider, but has become respected and loved by all members of the community due to her role as a mentor to younger traders. She works at The Hopefuls' Alliance, a cooperative where she holds the senior trader position. Her physical detail includes a scar on her forehead.

family.relationship: motherly towards Dunla, respected by all

Una Bradner.habits: Una is a very independent and self-reliant person. She spends most of her time working, trading goods and supplies at The Hopefuls' Alliance. When not working, she enjoys exploring the hauntingly beautiful surroundings of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones and scavenging for valuable resources. Una is also known for her sharp wit and cunning personality, which she uses to make allies and protect herself from potential foes.
Una Bradner.history: Una was born outside of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, making her an outsider to the community. She arrived in the community when she was only 19 years old and had to work hard to gain the respect and trust of the inhabitants. After years of hard work, she became a senior trader at The Hopefuls' Alliance and gained a position of power within the community. Una keeps her past a secret and rarely speaks of it, but rumors suggest that she comes from a lost civilization with unique beliefs and customs. Una's goal is to continue to gain wealth, power, knowledge, and safety for herself and her community.

job.description: Tough, intelligent and resourceful
job.quote: "Never underestimate the importance of making allies"
job.relations: mentor to younger traders

Una Bradner.name: Una
plot: Una's past comes back to haunt her when a group of individuals from her lost civilization arrive in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones.
The Hopefuls' Alliance faces a crisis when a rival cooperative tries to shut them down. Una must use all her skills and resources to protect her community.

Una discovers an ancient artifact while scavenging in the surroundings of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. The artifact reveals secrets about the lost civilization she comes from and puts her in danger.
A new member arrives in the Enclave of the Forgotten Ones and challenges Una's position as a chief. Una must find a way to deal with this threat.
Una Bradner.quote: "Never underestimate the importance of making allies"

relationship.Dunla Ironside: Una has a motherly relationship towards Dunla Ironside and acts as her mentor. Dunla looks up to Una as a role model and often seeks her advice.
relationship.Gale Brisbane: Una has a good relationship with Gale Brisbane, the nurturing matriarch who always looks out for her family. They often trade goods and share meals together.
relationship.Juliana Fullet: Una has a very positive relationship with Juliana Fullet, the wise and loving matriarch of the Fullet family. Una often seeks Juliana's advice on matters relating to personal relationships and life in the Enclave of the Forgotten Ones.
relationship.Quinn Vain: Una has a respectful relationship with Quinn Vain, the wise and respected boss of The Hopefuls' Alliance. They often discuss business strategies and share their knowledge about trading.

anecdotes: Yaraeeae once joined a scavenging expedition beyond the borders of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, and narrowly escaped an encounter with a group of bandits.
As a child, Yaraeeae was very competitive and would often challenge his siblings and cousins to games and competitions.
Yaraeeae is a talented musician and often plays the lute in his free time.
Yaraeeae Koeheruil.clothes: fitted shirt and trousers with a leather vest
Yaraeeae Koeheruil.description: Yaraeeae Koeheruil is a half-elf with short and styled black hair and hazel eyes. He is of middle age and has an average physique. Yaraeeae is ambitious and aspires to someday lead The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, which is his home. He is respected by most members of his community and gets along well with them, but can be competitive at times. Yaraeeae works as a scavenger in The Guardian Corps, which is responsible for the defense of the community.

family.relationship: Expects to become the successor of his father Naral

Yaraeeae Koeheruil.habits: Yaraeeae takes his duties as a scavenger and potential future leader of the community very seriously. He is a sharp and confident individual who is always ready to take on new challenges. Yaraeeae is an avid reader and enjoys spending time alone to contemplate his future goals and aspirations. He is also very organized and makes sure that he has a clear plan before he undertakes any task.
Yaraeeae Koeheruil.history: Yaraeeae comes from a family of scavengers who have been living in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones for generations. His father, Naral, is a beloved leader and skilled warrior in the community, while his mother passed away when he was young. Yaraeeae grew up with his younger siblings and cousins in a tight-knit family group consisting of mostly natives. He was always a curious and ambitious child, and was determined to make a name for himself in the community. As he grew older, Yaraeeae's ambitions only grew stronger, and he became more and more involved in the affairs of The Guardian Corps. He has worked hard to gain the respect of his colleagues and fellow community members, and hopes one day to take on the role of leader.

job.description: Ambitious and respected future leader
job.quote: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts."
job.relations: Aspires to someday lead The Enclave and gets along well with most members, but can be competitive at times.

Yaraeeae Koeheruil.name: Yaraeeae
plot: Yaraeeae's father, Naral, is getting older and may soon retire from his position as a leader in the community. Yaraeeae sees this as an opportunity to prove himself as a capable leader and gain the respect of his fellow community members. However, there are other contenders for the position who may not be as willing to give up without a fight.

Yaraeeae's ambitions have led him to become somewhat isolated from his family group and other members of the community. He must balance his desire for success with the need for communal bonds and a sense of belonging.
Yaraeeae's secret lack of belief in the religious customs of the community could cause problems if it were to be discovered. He must navigate this delicate situation carefully.
Yaraeeae's job as a scavenger in The Guardian Corps puts him in danger on a regular basis. He may have to make difficult decisions in order to protect himself and his colleagues.
Yaraeeae Koeheruil.quote: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts."
Yaraeeae Koeheruil.relations: Aspires to someday lead The Enclave and gets along well with most members, but can be competitive at times.

relationship.Atri'Garvanavia: As a senior scout in The Guardian Corps, Atri'Garvanavia is one of Yaraeeae's colleagues. While they work well together, Yaraeeae sometimes feels overshadowed by Atri'Garvanavia's sharpness and calculating nature.
relationship.Azaselin Koeheruil: As the youngest son of Yaraeeae's family group, Azaselin often feels misunderstood and left out. However, Yaraeeae tries to make an effort to include him in community activities and support him whenever he can.
relationship.Cecily Brisbane: As the leader of The Guardian Corps, Cecily and Yaraeeae work closely together. While Yaraeeae respects her as a leader and colleague, he also sees her as a potential rival for leadership of the community.
relationship.Kearey Bainbridge: As the wise matriarch of Yaraeeae's family group, Kearey is a respected voice in the community. Yaraeeae looks up to her and often seeks her advice on various matters.
relationship.Naral Koeheruil: Yaraeeae has a close relationship with his father, who is also a respected leader in the community. Naral has always supported Yaraeeae's ambitions and believes that he will one day make a great leader himself.

Yaraeeae Koeheruil.secret: Yaraeeae doesn't believe in the religious customs of the community

anecdotes: Cobb once saved the life of a young girl who had wandered too far into the ruins. He risked his own life to retrieve her and bring her back to the safety of the community.

During a particularly harsh winter, when the group's supplies were running low, Cobb came up with a plan to ration the food and distribute it fairly among the members. His practical approach helped the community survive the winter without any casualties.
Cobb Denby.description: Cobb Denby, the current leader of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, is a curmudgeonly and stubborn man fiercely protective of his community. He has seen the community through many tough times and has managed to keep them safe and prosperous for many years. While he can be pessimistic at times, his practical nature and strong leadership have kept the group together. Cobb's relationship with his family is strong, but he finds it difficult to manage his son Kerr's impulsive nature. Cobb also secretly struggles with alcoholism, but he does not let it affect his leadership or decision-making skills.

family.relationship: distant from his father and thinks his brother Kerr is too impulsive

Cobb Denby.habits: Cobb has a habit of starting his day with a cup of strong coffee before attending to his daily duties. He takes his job very seriously and can often be found working long hours in the Rusty Raiders. During his free time, he enjoys reading, particularly historical texts about the lost civilization that once inhabited the area.
Cobb Denby.history: Cobb was born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones and comes from a long line of community leaders. His grandfather, Baen Denby, served as the eldest member of the group before passing the mantle to Cobb's father. When his father passed away, it was only natural that Cobb would take up the role of leader. He has been in the position for over a decade now and has seen the community through many challenges and hardships. Despite the precarious existence of The Enclave, Cobb has managed to keep the community safe and prosperous through his resourceful leadership.

job.description: Curmudgeonly and stubborn, fiercely protective of the Enclave
job.quote: "We'll defend this place to the last man"
job.relations: Cobb is a grizzled veteran of the Enclave and its current leader. He can be pessimistic at times, but his practical nature and strong leadership have kept the community safe and prosperous for many years. He is highly respected by all members of the Enclave, but has a soft spot for his family and friends.

Cobb Denby.name: Cobb

plot: Cobb's struggle with alcoholism may eventually become public knowledge, causing concern among the members of the community about his ability to lead effectively.
A group of raiders from a neighboring community threaten to attack The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. Cobb must devise a plan to defend the community and protect its members.

Cobb discovers that some members of his community have been secretly hoarding resources. He must figure out a way to address the issue without causing division or turning the community against each other.

relationship.Crowle Denby: Cobb sees a bit of himself in his youngest son and tries to guide him towards responsible decision-making.
relationship.Kerr Denby: Cobb loves his son, but finds it difficult to manage Kerr's impulsive nature. He worries that it may put the community at risk.
relationship.Nuiss Tyaruil: As the community resource manager, Nuiss works closely with Cobb to ensure the community's needs are met. They have a professional relationship built on trust and mutual respect.
relationship.Victor Ironside: As another community resource manager, Victor shares many of the same responsibilities as Cobb and works closely with him to ensure the community's prosperity.

He is highly respected for his vast knowledge and his philosophical musings. He has a close relationship with his son, Boren, and often shares his insights with him.
Garrett Mallett.secret: He secretly misses his adventures as a young man
Garrett Mallett.short_description: A respected and experienced man known for his knowledge of history

anecdotes: Geduve once saved the life of a young orphan who was scavenging for food in the wilderness. She took the child under her wing and raised him as her own, teaching him the trade and making him a respected member of The Hopefuls' Alliance.

When the community was hit by a severe storm that destroyed most of the crops, Geduve rallied the inhabitants and led them on a scavenging mission to find supplies in nearby settlements. Thanks to her resourcefulness and leadership, they managed to survive the harsh winter that followed.
Geduve is known for her fair treatment of everyone, regardless of their status or background. She once famously said "We are all equal in the eyes of the single god."
Geduve Steadfast.clothes: leather apron over a sturdy skirt and blouse
Geduve Steadfast.description: Geduve Steadfast is an old dwarf woman who has been living in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones since birth. Her parents were among the founders of the community, and she has always been a respected leader and a mother figure to the inhabitants. Geduve is tough, fair, resourceful and practical, traits that have allowed her to lead the co-op at The Hopefuls' Alliance, the main trading post in the community. She always wears a leather apron over a sturdy skirt and blouse, and has a short, silver bob and blue eyes which give her a determined look. Despite her age, Geduve is still very pretty and has a hauntingly beautiful aura that makes people feel safe around her.

family.relationship: respected leader, mother figure

Geduve Steadfast.habits: Geduve has a habit of always making sure everyone has a say in how things are run. She believes that a communal bond is necessary for survival in their precarious existence. She is also very organized and structured, preferring cooperative ways of doing things. Geduve is a master trader and spends most of her time at The Hopefuls' Alliance, overseeing the trading activities and making sure everything runs smoothly.
Geduve Steadfast.history: Geduve was born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, and has never left it since. She learned the trade from her parents and became a skilled trader herself, eventually leading the co-op at The Hopefuls' Alliance. Her leadership skills have been crucial for the survival of the community, and she has always been dedicated to maintaining the communal bonds and ensuring the safety and security of the inhabitants. Geduve is a devout follower of the single god worshipped in the community, a non-gendered deity that forbids the undead and is different from the big empire's beliefs. She is also well-versed in the local beliefs of the unique continent. Despite her tough exterior, Geduve is hiding a secret: her parents were among the founders of the community, and her legacy is both a burden and a source of pride for her.

job.description: leader of the co-op
job.quote: "We'll make sure everyone has a say in how we run things"
job.relations: leading the co-op
job.working_clothes: brown cloak with gold trim, red boots

Geduve Steadfast.name: Geduve
plot: Geduve has been noticing some changes in the behavior of some of the inhabitants of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. She suspects that there might be a group of people who are trying to sabotage the communal bonds and sow discord among the community. Her goal is to uncover this plot and stop it before it causes irreparable damage.

The prosperity of The Hopefuls' Alliance has been declining lately, and Geduve is worried that they might not have enough resources to survive the harsh winter that is coming. Her goal is to find new trading partners and increase the variety of goods they trade in order to ensure the community's survival.

Geduve has recently received word that her niece, who lives in a nearby settlement, is in trouble and needs her help. Her goal is to leave The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones temporarily and travel to the settlement to provide assistance.

A group of adventurers has arrived in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, looking for a guide to take them to a lost civilization rumored to be nearby. Geduve sees an opportunity to increase the community's prosperity by offering her services as a guide, but she is also hesitant because she knows that the lost civilization is dangerous and could lead to the community's downfall if not handled properly.
Geduve Steadfast.quote: "We'll make sure everyone has a say in how we run things"

relationship.Bailey Brisbane: Bailey is Gale Brisbane's daughter and a young apprentice trader at The Hopefuls' Alliance. Geduve sees her as a promising young talent and often offers her guidance and advice as she learns the trade.
relationship.Darlave Softshadow: Geduve has taken Darlave under her wing and is mentoring her as an apprentice trader at The Hopefuls' Alliance. She sees potential in Darlave and is proud of her progress.
relationship.Gwen Brisbane: Gwen is Gale Brisbane's wife and a nurturing matriarch who always looks out for her family. Geduve sees her as a respected elder and often seeks her advice when dealing with family matters.
relationship.Jordan Hurst: Jordan is a kind and wise member of the community, and Geduve sees him as a friend and confidante. She often turns to him for emotional support and advice in times of need.
relationship.Juliana Fullet: Juliana is a wise and loving matriarch who is respected by all. Geduve sees her as a role model and often seeks her guidance when dealing with difficult situations.
relationship.Niall Vain: Niall is one of the senior traders at The Hopefuls' Alliance and a respected member of the community. Geduve sees him as a trusted advisor and often seeks his counsel when making important decisions.
relationship.Una Bradner: Geduve and Una have been working together at The Hopefuls' Alliance for many years. They share a mutual respect and friendship, and often rely on each other's skills and expertise.

Geduve Steadfast.secret: her parents were among the founders of the community
Geduve Steadfast.working_clothes: brown cloak with gold trim, red boots

anecdotes: Gilihalki once saved a group of scavengers from an ambush by a band of raiders. The scavengers were so grateful that they gave him a rare artifact from the old empire as a token of their appreciation.

During a guard shift, Gilihalki encountered a lone traveler who was lost and injured. He helped the traveler and brought them back to The Enclave, where they were able to recuperate. The traveler turned out to be a scholar who had important information about the unique continent and its history. The scholar shared this knowledge with Gilihalki, and he was fascinated by what he learned.

Gilihalki has a particular fondness for his family's vegetable garden. He often spends time there, helping his mother tend to the plants and vegetables. It reminds him of the importance of community and self-sustainability in their precarious existence.
Gilihalki Tyaruil.description: Gilihalki Tyaruil is a 25-year-old male human who works as a senior guard for The Guardian Corps in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He is a brave and skilled warrior who takes his job very seriously, willing to protect his community with his life if necessary. Gilihalki comes from a native family that consists of his father Trynyn, his mother Feraro, his eldest sister Nuiss, his younger sister Relyth, his eccentric aunt Jaer, his rebellious cousin Theradarsha, and his innocent grandchild Feraibrar. Gilihalki has always had a close bond with his family, particularly with his younger brother who he looks after and protects. He is respected and admired by his family members, especially his younger brother.

family.relationship: respected and admired by his family members, especially his younger brother

Gilihalki Tyaruil.habits: Gilihalki is a disciplined individual who has strict habits. He wakes up at dawn and starts his day with a rigorous training session to maintain his physique and combat skills. After training, he has breakfast and checks the equipment and tools he needs for his guard shift. During his shift, he is focused and alert, making sure that everyone in the community is safe. In his free time, he likes to spend time with his family, particularly his younger brother. He also enjoys reading books about the old empire and honing his combat skills.
Gilihalki Tyaruil.history: Gilihalki was born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He grew up surrounded by the hauntingly beautiful landscape and the communal bonds of his family and neighbors. His family members were all strong and resourceful individuals who taught him how to survive in this precarious existence. When Gilihalki was 16 years old, he joined The Guardian Corps and was trained as a guard. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his skill and determination and became a senior guard at the age of 23. Gilihalki has always been proud of his native heritage and has a deep respect for the lost civilization that once inhabited this forgotten realm.

job.description: Brave and skilled warrior
job.quote: "I will protect this community with my life."
job.relations: Is fiercely loyal to The Enclave and has a particularly close bond with Atri'Garvanavia and Yaraeeae Koeheruil.

Gilihalki Tyaruil.name: Gilihalki
plot: Gilihalki discovers an ancient map that leads to a lost ruin on the unique continent, and he becomes determined to explore it. However, he must navigate treacherous terrain and avoid dangerous creatures to reach the ruins.

The Enclave is threatened by a mysterious illness that has started to infect the inhabitants. Gilihalki takes it upon himself to investigate and find a cure, even if it means traveling to dangerous places outside The Enclave.

Gilihalki's younger brother gets involved in a dangerous situation, and Gilihalki must risk his life to save him. However, he soon realizes that his brother's predicament is part of a larger plot that threatens The Enclave as a whole.

A new group of travelers arrives in The Enclave with the promise of trade and prosperity. Gilihalki becomes suspicious of their intentions and starts to investigate, uncovering a web of deceit and danger that threatens the community.
Gilihalki Tyaruil.quote: "I will protect this community with my life."
Gilihalki Tyaruil.relations: Is fiercely loyal to The Enclave and has a particularly close bond with Atri'Garvanavia and Yaraeeae Koeheruil.

relationship.Atri'Garvanavia: Gilihalki has a close working relationship with Atri'Garvanavia, who is a skilled scout and leads patrols for The Guardian Corps. They have a mutual respect for each other and have worked together on several occasions to protect The Enclave.
relationship.Feraro Tyaruil: Gilihalki has a deep respect and love for his mother, Feraro, who is the family head and a strong-willed and protective figure in the family. He looks up to her and often seeks her advice when faced with difficult decisions.
relationship.Jaer Tyaruil: Gilihalki's eccentric aunt, Jaer, is an unconventional and free-spirited individual who often surprises Gilihalki with her antics and ideas. Although he sometimes finds her behavior strange, he loves his aunt and appreciates her unique perspective on life.
relationship.Nuiss Tyaruil: Gilihalki's eldest sister, Nuiss, is responsible and hardworking, always looking out for others. Gilihalki has a close bond with her and often relies on her support and wisdom.
relationship.Relyth Tyaruil: Gilihalki's younger sister, Relyth, is an artistic and sensitive teenager. Although they have different interests, Gilihalki is supportive of his sister and often encourages her to pursue her passions.
relationship.Theradarsha Tyaruil: Gilihalki's cousin, Theradarsha, is a curious and carefree individual who loves exploring the ruins around The Enclave. Gilihalki admires his cousin's adventurous spirit but also worries about her safety and often tries to keep an eye on her when she goes on her expeditions.
relationship.Yaraeeae Koeheruil: Gilihalki also has a close relationship with Yaraeeae Koeheruil, who is a scavenger and a boss at The Guardian Corps. She is ambitious and respected and is seen as a future leader of The Enclave. Gilihalki has worked with her on several occasions and admires her leadership skills and determination.

family.relationship: she wishes she could explore the world beyond the enclave

Girta Wroughthammer.name: Girta
Girta Wroughthammer.structure_preference: I wonder what it would be like to see the sunrise over the ocean.

family.relationship: deeply cares for her family, tries to keep them together

job.quote: "Animals are our greatest companions."
job.relations: Treats Dara Mallett like a grandchild, tends to be dismissive of Thorne Wroughthammer's moodiness.

Gorina Wroughthammer.name: Gorina
Gorina Wroughthammer.relations: Treats Dara Mallett like a grandchild, tends to be dismissive of Thorne Wroughthammer's moodiness.

anecdotes: Jordan once saved a young trader's life by applying a plant remedy she had collected in the forest. The trader had come down with a mysterious illness that no one could cure, but Jordan knew just what to do.
Jordan has been known to go on long walks in the nearby forest to clear her mind and seek guidance from the spirits. She always returns with a renewed sense of purpose.
Once, during a particularly harsh winter, Jordan led an effort to collect firewood for the entire enclave. Her efforts kept everyone warm and fed, despite the precarious existence of the group.
Jordan Hurst.clothes: flowing white robes with a red sash
Jordan Hurst.description: Jordan Hurst, also known as The Wise One, is a kind and wise matriarch of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. With short salt-and-pepper hair worn in a bun and radiant wrinkled skin, she stands short but commands respect from all who know her. She has been a respected member of the community for decades, advising younger traders and helping to build up The Hopefuls' Alliance. Despite her husband's past as a slaver, Jordan is known for her resilient and compassionate nature. She is a spiritual person and deeply believes in the local non-gendered deity, which is unique to this forgotten realm. Jordan wears flowing white robes with a red sash, adding to her hauntingly beautiful appearance.

family.relationship: matriarch of the group

Jordan Hurst.habits: Jordan habitually wakes up early every day to meditate and pray. She spends her days trading goods with other communities, mainly food and supplies, and then returns to her home in the evening to advise and mentor younger traders. Jordan also takes time to visit the sick and injured in the enclave, offering spiritual guidance and healing using herbs and plant remedies she collects in the surrounding forest.
Jordan Hurst.hair: short salt-and-pepper hair, worn in a bun
Jordan Hurst.history: Jordan Hurst came to The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones as an outsider many years ago, seeking refuge after her husband's past as a slaver was discovered by their previous community. Despite initial distrust, Jordan quickly gained the trust of the people here with her kind and wise demeanor. Over the years, she has helped to build up The Hopefuls' Alliance into a prosperous trading co-op and has become a matriarch of the group with her spiritual guidance and mentoring. Jordan's life has not always been easy, but her resilience and perseverance have allowed her to overcome many obstacles.

job.description: kind and wise, a respected member of the community
job.quote: "I've seen this co-op grow for decades. We're in good hands"
job.relations: advising younger traders

Jordan Hurst.name: Jordan
plot: Jordan's spiritual beliefs often come into conflict with the local beliefs of the big empire that surrounds the enclave. This could lead to a potential plot where Jordan must convince outsiders of the validity of her non-gendered deity.
Jordan's husband's past as a slaver could come back to haunt her and threaten her standing in the enclave if it were to be discovered by someone from outside the group.

As a senior member of the community, Jordan is getting older and may soon need to pass on her wisdom and mentoring role to someone else. This could lead to tension between the younger and older members of the enclave.
Jordan has always been curious about the lost civilization that once occupied this area and could be motivated to embark on a quest to gain more knowledge about it.
Jordan Hurst.quote: "I've seen this co-op grow for decades. We're in good hands"

relationship.Bors Ashcroft: Jordan respects Bors for his practicality and gruff nature, but does not always see eye-to-eye with him. She sometimes finds him too strict with the younger members of the enclave.
relationship.Darlave Softshadow: Jordan has a great deal of respect for Darlave, who is the boss of The Hopefuls' Alliance and a seasoned trader. She often seeks out his advice on matters of business and trade.
relationship.Juliana Fullet: Jordan has a deep connection with Juliana, the wise and loving matriarch of the living group with origins as outsiders. They often discuss matters of spirituality and the importance of communal bonds.
relationship.Niall Vain: Jordan has a close relationship with Niall, another senior trader in The Hopefuls' Alliance. The two often work together on trading missions and offer spiritual guidance to each other.

Jordan Hurst.secret: her husband was once a slaver
Jordan Hurst.short_description: kind and wise, a respected member of the community

anecdotes: Once when a harsh winter storm destroyed most of the crops in the family's garden, Juliana worked tirelessly with her grandchildren to scavenge for edible plants in the surrounding forest. They managed to find enough food to last them until the next planting season.

Juliana once taught an apprentice trader at The Hopefuls' Alliance how to make a special dish that is unique to their native culture. This dish has become a staple for many communal meals and has helped bring the community together.
Despite her age, Juliana still likes to dance during communal celebrations. Her graceful moves have earned her the nickname 'The Dancing Cook.'
Juliana Fullet.description: Juliana Fullet is a wise and loving matriarch of the Fullet family, one of the few remaining native families in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. Despite her age of 65, Juliana remains an active member of the community and works as a trader at The Hopefuls' Alliance. Her skills in cooking have made her the go-to person when it comes to preparing communal meals for the family and the co-op. Her hospitality, intuition, patience, and wisdom make her respected by all family members and her colleagues at work. Although she appears old, her hazel eyes still radiate warmth that reflects her loving and caring nature. She dresses in plain linen dress and wears a silver hairpin on her short grey hair. Despite the precarious existence of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, Juliana remains resilient, resourceful, and hopeful that her people will thrive despite their isolation.

family.relationship: respected by all family members

goals: finding a way out of the enclave
Juliana Fullet.habits: Juliana wakes up before sunrise every day to either tend to the family's garden or prepare food for the communal meal. She is meticulous in planning the meals and ensures that everyone gets their fair share. Juliana enjoys spending time with her grandchildren and teaching them about local beliefs and the spirit of the single god. In her free time, Juliana prays to a deity that is different from the one worshipped by most inhabitants of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones.
Juliana Fullet.history: Juliana was born as Vain, into a family that has lived in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones for generations. Her family was one of the few that never migrated from the enclave despite the precarious existence and the constant scavenging for resources. Juliana married Barlowe Fullet, the current family head, and helped him raise their children, Cacey and Gale. She taught them the art of cooking and instilled in them the importance of communal bonds. As she grew older, she became wiser and more patient, earning the respect of everyone around her. Her secret prayer to a different deity has been with her for years and was passed down to her by her own grandmother.

job.description: wise and loving matriarch
job.quote: "Cooking is the glue that keeps this community together"
job.relations: preparing communal meals

Juliana Fullet.name: Juliana
plot: Juliana discovers a rare ingredient in the forest that could turn the fortunes of The Hopefuls' Alliance, but she needs to convince her colleagues to go on a dangerous journey to retrieve it.

The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones is threatened by the undead, something that Juliana has never encountered before. She must use her wisdom and knowledge of local beliefs and the spirit of the single god to protect her family and the community.

Juliana discovers a lost relic from a long-forgotten civilization that could help answer some of the mysteries surrounding The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones and her native culture. But she must decide whether to share this knowledge with the wider community or keep it to herself and her family.

The Hopefuls' Alliance is faced with a rival co-op that wants to take over their market share. Juliana must use her cunning and resourcefulness to help protect the livelihoods of her colleagues and ensure that the co-op remains prosperous.
Juliana Fullet.quote: "Cooking is the glue that keeps this community together"

relationship.Barlowe Fullet: Juliana respects her husband and has stood by him for years as he led the family through many hardships. She is also grateful for the children they raised together, and she tries to instill in them the importance of family and communal bonds.
relationship.Brunner Fullet: As Juliana's grandson, Brunner represents the future of the family, which gives Juliana hope for their survival. Juliana enjoys spending time with Brunner and teaching him about the local beliefs and the spirit of the single god.
relationship.Cacey Fullet: As the youngest son and an ambitious young man, Cacey looks up to his grandmother Juliana for guidance and wisdom. Juliana is proud of Cacey's determination and resourcefulness, even though they have different ideas about how to make The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones thrive.
relationship.Darlave Softshadow: Darlave is Juliana's boss at The Hopefuls' Alliance, and Juliana respects her for her knowledge and experience in the trade. Juliana often collaborates with Darlave to prepare food for the co-op's communal meals.
relationship.Gale Fullet: As the eldest daughter and a strong young woman, Gale shares much of Juliana's charm and determination. Juliana sees a lot of herself in Gale and hopes that Gale will continue to be a driving force for preserving native culture and promoting communal bonds.
relationship.Geduve Steadfast: As the leader of the co-op, Geduve is responsible for ensuring that The Hopefuls' Alliance remains prosperous. Juliana respects Geduve's leadership skills and recognizes the importance of a strong and stable co-op in the fragile existence of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones.
relationship.Una Bradner: As a senior trader at The Hopefuls' Alliance, Una and Juliana have worked together for years. Juliana admires Una's toughness, intelligence, and resourcefulness.

Juliana Fullet.secret: secretly prays to a different deity

anecdotes: Kade once got into a brawl with a group of scavengers who had been stealing supplies from The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He emerged victorious but was banned from the local tavern for a month as punishment.
Kade once made a suit of armor for his daughter, Dara Tolbert, that was so well crafted it sold for a high price in a neighboring town.
Kade has a tattoo of a dragon on his right hand that he got to symbolize his desire for adventure and freedom.
Kade Tolbert.description: Kade Tolbert is a hot-tempered and impulsive man who dreams of adventure and riches. He is proud of his blacksmithing skills and often boasts about them, while also being quick to anger when something goes wrong. Kade loves his family but can be neglectful at times due to his desire for adventure. He secretly wishes he could leave The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones and never look back. Despite this, he is a valuable member of the community due to his expert blacksmithing abilities.

family.relationship: loves his family, but can be neglectful

Kade Tolbert.habits: Kade is a hard worker, spending most of his time in The Tolbert Foundry crafting weapons and armor. He enjoys a good fight and will often get into arguments with other inhabitants of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He is known to act first and think later, which can lead to reckless behavior. Kade also has a tendency to drink heavily when he is feeling down or frustrated.
Kade Tolbert.history: Kade was born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, where he learned the art of blacksmithing from his father and foreman, Boren Tolbert. He has always dreamed of leaving the enclave to explore the world and make a name for himself. However, he has never been able to bring himself to actually leave. Kade has a rebellious streak and often clashes with authority figures. Despite this, he has a deep love for his family and respects their traditions.

job.description: hot-tempered and impulsive man who dreams of adventure and riches
job.quote: There's nothing that can't be fixed with a hammer
job.relations: Barks orders and boasts about his skills, but respects his family members

Kade Tolbert.name: Kade
Kade Tolbert.physical detail: a tattoo of a dragon on his right hand
plot: Kade's desire for adventure finally gets the best of him, and he leaves The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones in search of treasure and fame. However, he soon realizes that the world outside is much more dangerous than he anticipated and must fight to survive.

Kade's pride gets the better of him, and he enters into a bet with a rival blacksmith that he can craft a sword so fine it will sell for five times its normal price. However, in his rush to complete the sword, he makes a mistake that nearly costs him everything.

Kade discovers a secret passage beneath The Tolbert Foundry that leads to a long-forgotten treasure trove. However, he must navigate dangerous traps and overcome fierce guardians to claim the treasure for himself.

Kade's neglectful behavior towards his family catches up with him when his daughter, Dara Tolbert, goes missing. He sets out on a perilous journey across the wilderness to find her before it's too late.
Kade Tolbert.quote: There's nothing that can't be fixed with a hammer
Kade Tolbert.relations: Barks orders and boasts about his skills, but respects his family members

relationship.Boren Tolbert: Kade respects and looks up to his older brother Boren, who is set to inherit The Tolbert Foundry after their father retires.
relationship.Dara Tolbert: Kade loves his daughter deeply and is proud of her energy and curiosity. He hopes to pass on the art of blacksmithing to her one day.
relationship.Derry Tolbert: Kade loves his wife Derry but struggles to balance his desire for adventure with his responsibilities as a father and husband. He often neglects her and fails to see the struggles she faces due to poverty and disease.
relationship.Muriel Tolbert: Kade loves and cares for his grandmother Muriel, who has always been a source of comfort and support for him.
relationship.Perth Tolbert: Kade has a deep respect for his grandfather Perth and often seeks his wisdom when he is feeling lost.

Kade Tolbert.secret: he secretly wishes he could leave The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones and never look back
Kade Tolbert.short_description: hot-tempered and impulsive man who dreams of adventure and riches

family.relationship: respected and feared by members

Kealey Ratcliff.name: Kealey
Kealey Ratcliff.quote: We will bring enlightenment to all those who seek it
Kealey Ratcliff.traits: A charismatic and ambitious young woman who is determined to take the cult to new heights

anecdotes: Kearey once saved a young child from drowning during a flood, despite her fear of water.
When scavengers attacked the group, Kearey led a successful defense and earned the respect of many members.
Kearey Bainbridge.clothes: long skirts with a blouse and shawl
Kearey Bainbridge.description: Kearey is a wise matriarch who holds The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones together. Despite her age, she still works as a watch and is highly respected for her skills and experience. She is known for her patient and traditional nature, and her resilience in the face of the precarious existence of the group. Kearey's blue eyes and short curly grey hair make her stand out in the hauntingly beautiful landscape of the forgotten realm. Her scar above her left eyebrow is a reminder of the dangers that she has faced. She wears long skirts with a blouse and shawl during her daily tasks and leather armor and helmet (brown) when at work for The Guardian Corps. Kearey is a key figure in the group and is commonly referred to as Commander Kay among its members. She lives in the family_type group with Delaney Keller and Victor Ironside, who she cares deeply for.

family.relationship: highly respected

Kearey Bainbridge.habits: Kearey has a habit of preparing herself mentally and physically for the worst, which has helped her survive in the isolated and dangerous environment of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. She spends a lot of her free time reading and studying to expand her knowledge and improve her skills. Despite her fear of water, she makes sure to always stay hydrated and encourages others to do so as well.
Kearey Bainbridge.history: Kearey came to The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones as an outsider, but quickly became a prominent member of the community due to her skills and leadership. She joined The Guardian Corps and worked her way up to become the boss of the watch. Kearey has lived through multiple crises in the group, including attacks from scavengers and natural disasters. She has always been able to keep the group together by relying on their communal bonds and the strong belief in a single, non-gendered deity. Kearey's goal is to ensure the safety and prosperity of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones while passing down her knowledge to future generations.

Naral Koeheruil.description: Naral Koeheruil is the beloved leader and skilled warrior of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He has been in this position for many years and has worked tirelessly to ensure the survival of his community. Naral is highly respected within the community, as he shoulders a great deal of responsibility and has demonstrated time and again that he cares deeply for the people under his protection. Despite his many responsibilities, Naral is still a skilled warrior and is always willing to defend his community from any threats. He has a close relationship with Barl, whom he trusts implicitly and often seeks his advice.

family.relationship: Highly respected within the community

Naral Koeheruil.habits: Naral is a strong and disciplined leader who leads by example. He is always the first one up in the morning and the last to go to bed at night. He has a strict but fair routine that he follows every day and expects the same from those around him. Naral is very organized and always keeps a detailed record of everything that happens within the enclave. He is also an avid reader and spends much of his free time studying the books he has acquired from the lost civilization.
Naral Koeheruil.hair: gray and tied into a ponytail
Naral Koeheruil.history: Naral was born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He is a half-elf and has always been valued for his physical prowess and intelligence. When he was still a young man, he began to take on more responsibility within the enclave and quickly became recognized as a natural leader. When the previous leader passed away, Naral was selected as his successor. Since then, he has worked tirelessly to ensure the survival of his community, despite the precarious existence they lead. As the leader of the enclave, Naral has faced many challenges, but he has always managed to find a way to overcome them. He has a secret stash of books from the lost civilization, which he is using to uncover more about their lost history and improve the lives of those under his protection.

anecdotes: Quinn once traded rare herbs and potions with a hermit living deep within the haunted forest of the enclave. The transaction was tricky, as the hermit refused to speak to Quinn directly, instead communicating through a series of notes.

When Quinn was a teenager, he and his friends stumbled upon an abandoned tower in the center of the enclave. After scaling its walls to the top, they discovered a hidden room containing maps and scrolls detailing a lost civilization that predates their own.

Once, during a heavy storm, Quinn offered shelter to a group of travelers who were stranded in the enclave. He spent the next several days regaling them with stories of the enclave's lost history, while they shared tales of their own adventures.

Quinn has a habit of collecting unique and valuable trinkets during his travels. He keeps them in a small box tucked away in his home, and he enjoys showing them off to visitors. One particular trinket, a golden compass, is said to point towards an unknown destination somewhere within the enclave's borders.
Quinn Vain.description: Quinn Vain, also known as The Halfling Elder, is a wise and respected member of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He is a skilled trader working at The Hopefuls' Alliance, leading the co-op alongside Geduve Steadfast. Quinn is an expert in his field, and he believes that the key to trading lies in listening more than speaking. Despite his age, he remains very pretty, with bright and kind grey eyes and long silvery hair. He usually dresses in a dignified robe with green accents and carries a staff. Quinn has a fatherly relationship with all members of the community, and he is respected by everyone in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones.

family.relationship: respected by everyone in the enclave, fatherly towards all members

Quinn Vain.habits: Quinn Vain is a patient and wise halfling who spends most of his time trading goods at The Hopefuls' Alliance. He is a great listener and enjoys hearing stories from people. When he's not working, Quinn likes to spend his spare time reading books, including a rare book of magic spells that he has been hiding for years.
Quinn Vain.history: Born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, Quinn is a native halfling who has lived there his entire life. He's seen it all, from the precarious existence of the community's early days to its current status as a resilient and resourceful group with communal bonds. Quinn's fatherly nature has made him a respected figure among both young and old members of the enclave. He is an integral part of a single trading alliance at The Hopefuls' Alliance, where he has worked with Geduve Steadfast to lead the co-op to prosperity. Quinn has been married to Niall for over 30 years, and they have four children: Mara, Durgan, Ryleigh, and himself.

job.description: wise and respected
job.quote: "The key to trading is in listening more than speaking"
job.relations: leading the co-op

Quinn Vain.name: Quinn
plot: Quinn's rare book of magic spells is coveted by a rival trading alliance in the enclave, who will stop at nothing to acquire it.
An ancient artifact is discovered within the enclave, and Quinn is convinced that it holds the key to uncovering the community's lost history.
Quinn discovers a dark secret about The Hopefuls' Alliance, and he must decide whether to reveal it and risk the loss of his position as the co-op's leader.

As a respected member of the community, Quinn is called upon to mediate a dispute between two feuding families in the enclave, but he soon realizes that there is more to the conflict than meets the eye.
Quinn Vain.quote: "The key to trading is in listening more than speaking"

relationship.Darlave Softshadow: Darlave is Quinn's apprentice at The Hopefuls' Alliance, and Quinn appreciates her inquisitive nature and intelligence. He enjoys teaching her about the intricacies of trading.
relationship.Durgan Vain: Durgan is Quinn's youngest son. He is energetic and curious, and he often accompanies his father on trading expeditions. Quinn is proud of his son's adventurous spirit, but he worries about his tendency towards clumsiness.
relationship.Geduve Steadfast: Geduve is Quinn's colleague at The Hopefuls' Alliance, and they work closely together to lead the co-op. They share a deep respect for each other's skills, and they often confide in one another.
relationship.Jordan Hurst: Jordan is a kind and wise member of the community who has earned Quinn's respect over the years. They share a mutual admiration for each other's wisdom and compassion.
relationship.Juliana Fullet: Juliana is a wise and loving matriarch who is respected by everyone in the enclave, including Quinn. He often seeks her guidance when dealing with personal or community matters.
relationship.Mara Vain: Mara is Quinn's eldest daughter. She is skilled and independent, and she often works with her father at The Hopefuls' Alliance. They share a deep respect for one another.
relationship.Niall Vain: Quinn is married to Niall, and they have a close and nurturing relationship. They have been together for over 30 years, and they have raised four children together.
relationship.Ryleigh Vain: Ryleigh is Quinn's youngest child, and he is introverted and sensitive. Although they do not share many interests, Quinn loves his son deeply and respects his studious nature.
relationship.Una Bradner: Una is Quinn's senior colleague at The Hopefuls' Alliance, and he admires her toughness and resourcefulness. He often seeks her advice when making difficult business decisions.

anecdotes: Trynyn once saved his cousin, Theradarsha Tyaruil, from a treacherous booby trap in the ruins. From that day on, the two became even closer.

During a scavenging mission with members of The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity, Trynyn encountered a strange and otherworldly creature. His quick thinking and bravery saved his team from certain doom.
Trynyn is known for his love of stories, often retelling tales from the lost civilization to his family and friends.
When one of his daughters, Relyth Tyaruil, expressed an interest in painting, Trynyn encouraged her and even helped her build a small art studio.
Trynyn Tyaruil.clothes: leather armor and simple tunics in earth tones
Trynyn Tyaruil.description: Trynyn Tyaruil is a 40-year-old half-elf who serves as the leader of his family. He is known for his protective and respected nature, always placing the safety of his loved ones first. Trynyn is a tall man with fair skin, short straight black hair, and brown eyes. He wears leather armor and simple tunics in earth tones. Trynyn's role in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones is crucial for the community's survival. He ensures that the community stays together and maintains communal bonds. He also leads various exploration missions in the surrounding area to find resources and any artifacts from the lost civilization. Despite the precarious existence of the community, Trynyn remains resourceful and resilient. His determination has inspired many in the community and earned him the nickname 'The Protector.'

family.relationship: respected and admired by his family members, tries to keep them safe

Trynyn Tyaruil.habits: Trynyn has a habit of waking up early and starting the day with a prayer to his non-gendered deity. He then spends time training for combat or exploring the ruins nearby, always accompanied by members of his family or colleagues from The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity. Trynyn is also known for his fairness and responsibility, always striving to lead by example.
Trynyn Tyaruil.history: Trynyn was born and raised in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. He comes from a family of natives and has lived his entire life in this forgotten realm. Trynyn learned about the single god worshipped in the community and its unique local beliefs from an early age. His family has always been close-knit, instilling in him a strong sense of family-first values. As he grew older and took on more responsibilities, Trynyn became determined to preserve his lost civilization's history and culture. He also became passionate about finding artifacts from this forgotten realm and exploring the ruins nearby. Trynyn's family and colleagues from The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity respect him for his dedication and unwavering determination.

job.description: Protective and respected family leader
job.quote: "Our unity will always keep us strong."
job.relations: Has a close relationship with Nimimilavain Tyaruil, is protective of Mahs'Besalasel during exploration missions.
job.workplace: The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity

Trynyn Tyaruil.name: Trynyn
plot: Trynyn may face challenges from rival scavenger groups who want to exploit The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones' resources. This could lead to dangerous territory disputes and conflicts.
As a leader, Trynyn may be faced with difficult decisions, such as whether to allow new members to join the community or how to allocate resources fairly.
The discovery of a valuable artifact could put The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones in danger, attracting the attention of powerful and unsavory characters.
Trynyn's past may come back to haunt him if he encounters someone from his hometown, who he believed died many years ago.
Trynyn Tyaruil.quote: "Our unity will always keep us strong."
Trynyn Tyaruil.relations: Has a close relationship with Nimimilavain Tyaruil, is protective of Mahs'Besalasel during exploration missions.

relationship.Feraro Tyaruil: Trynyn's mother, Feraro Tyaruil, is a strong-willed and protective presence in his life. While he doesn't always agree with her decisions, he deeply loves and respects her.
relationship.Gilihalki Tyaruil: Trynyn's eldest son, Gilihalki Tyaruil, is a skilled warrior admired by many in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. Trynyn is proud of his son's bravery and loyalty.
relationship.Mahs'Besalasel: Trynyn is protective of Mahs'Besalasel, an explorer and apprentice in The Pilgrims of the Forgotten Deity. He sees potential in her and has made it his mission to ensure she stays safe and learns from her experiences.
relationship.Nimimilavain Tyaruil: Trynyn has a very close relationship with his grandmother, Nimimilavain Tyaruil. He greatly respects her wisdom and often seeks her counsel when making important decisions.
relationship.Nuiss Tyaruil: Trynyn's eldest daughter, Nuiss Tyaruil, is responsible and hardworking, constantly looking out for others. Trynyn is proud of her and hopes to pass on his leadership skills to her one day.
relationship.Theradarsha Tyaruil: Trynyn's cousin, Theradarsha Tyaruil, is curious and carefree, often joining him on exploration missions. The two share a close bond and look out for each other in dangerous situations.

family.relationship: loves her family, but prefers to spend time alone or with her books

Uhlith Wroughthammer.name: Uhlith
Uhlith Wroughthammer.physical detail: a small birthmark on her neck
Uhlith Wroughthammer.quote: I just want to be left alone.
Uhlith Wroughthammer.secret: she sometimes sneaks into the Old Temple to play "priest"

anecdotes: Una once outwitted a group of scavengers who were trying to steal goods from The Hopefuls' Alliance. She managed to get them to leave without any violence while keeping the supplies safe.
Una is known for her motherly relationship towards Dunla Ironside, who looks up to her as a mentor and role model.
Una secretly loves one of the inhabitants in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, but has not revealed the identity of the person to anyone.
Una Bradner.description: Una Bradner, also known as The Resourceful One, is a tough, intelligent and resourceful woman. She wears a leather armor and fur mantle with boots. Her brown eyes and long brown hair complement her fair skin. Una is 37 years old, but looks young for her age. She lives in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, a small community with communal bonds and a precarious existence. Una is the chief of the hierarchy group composed of herself and an apprentice named Dunla Ironside. Una is an outsider, but has become respected and loved by all members of the community due to her role as a mentor to younger traders. She works at The Hopefuls' Alliance, a cooperative where she holds the senior trader position. Her physical detail includes a scar on her forehead.

family.relationship: motherly towards Dunla, respected by all

Una Bradner.habits: Una is a very independent and self-reliant person. She spends most of her time working, trading goods and supplies at The Hopefuls' Alliance. When not working, she enjoys exploring the hauntingly beautiful surroundings of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones and scavenging for valuable resources. Una is also known for her sharp wit and cunning personality, which she uses to make allies and protect herself from potential foes.
Una Bradner.history: Una was born outside of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones, making her an outsider to the community. She arrived in the community when she was only 19 years old and had to work hard to gain the respect and trust of the inhabitants. After years of hard work, she became a senior trader at The Hopefuls' Alliance and gained a position of power within the community. Una keeps her past a secret and rarely speaks of it, but rumors suggest that she comes from a lost civilization with unique beliefs and customs. Una's goal is to continue to gain wealth, power, knowledge, and safety for herself and her community.

job.description: Tough, intelligent and resourceful
job.quote: "Never underestimate the importance of making allies"
job.relations: mentor to younger traders

Una Bradner.name: Una
plot: Una's past comes back to haunt her when a group of individuals from her lost civilization arrive in The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones.
The Hopefuls' Alliance faces a crisis when a rival cooperative tries to shut them down. Una must use all her skills and resources to protect her community.

Una discovers an ancient artifact while scavenging in the surroundings of The Enclave of the Forgotten Ones. The artifact reveals secrets about the lost civilization she comes from and puts her in danger.
A new member arrives in the Enclave of the Forgotten Ones and challenges Una's position as a chief. Una must find a way to deal with this threat.
Una Bradner.quote: "Never underestimate the importance of making allies"

relationship.Dunla Ironside: Una has a motherly relationship towards Dunla Ironside and acts as her mentor. Dunla looks up to Una as a role model and often seeks her advice.
relationship.Gale Brisbane: Una has a good relationship with Gale Brisbane, the nurturing matriarch who always looks out for her family. They often trade goods and share meals together.
relationship.Juliana Fullet: Una has a very positive relationship with Juliana Fullet, the wise and loving matriarch of the Fullet family. Una often seeks Juliana's advice on matters relating to personal relationships and life in the Enclave of the Forgotten Ones.
relationship.Quinn Vain: Una has a respectful relationship with Quinn Vain, the wise and respected boss of The Hopefuls' Alliance. They often discuss business strategies and share their knowledge about trading.
